name: FNF - Vs. Ronald McDonald
description:
Story:
Ronald overhear you and your gf talking about what to eat at the mall. Gf was thinking McDonalds, but you were leaning more towards Burger King. Shame you had to say that right in front of the mascot himself in front of a McDonalds. Now Ronald's here to serve you some fresh McRaps and fry yo ass up with a side of fries in front of your gf.

...Hope you can live to see another day.
